element.name: DniEng
element.translation:
D'ni to English Dictionary

AH

ah, prep. marks an object directly affected by the action of the verb -ah, suff. imperative mood ahbtsee, n. basalt ahbtseeehts, adj. basaltic ahchah, n. climate(?), air(?), sun(?), light(?) ahgo, adj, adv. well ahl, n. crown(?), branch(?), foliage(?) -ahl, suff. verb-adjective suffix (-ing/-ed) ahlgah (unknown) -ahloth, suff. verb-noun suffix (one who endures an action or state) -ahm, suff. man(?), member(?) ahn, n. body of water(?) ahnee, v. become, get ahno, n. water ahnoehts, adj. wet ahnotahm, n. lava; magma-based ahr, v. go(?), enter(?), do(?) ahreeuh, v. protect ahreeuhtahn, n. protector ahreeuhtahv, n. protection ahro, adj. other, different ahrotahn, n. outsider, outworlder ahroy, v. attend(?) ahrtah, v. allow(?), permit(?), let(?), do(?), cause(?) ahtmay, v. stop(?), remove (?) ahtsoo, adj. ready ahveh, n. error Ahvo, n. Father(?) ahyoheek, n. D'ni game very similar to rock-paper-scissors

A

advuh, n. arch atinor, n. beauty atinoreht, adj. beautiful

AY

aylah, v. (unknown) ayshoyk, v. realize ayts'day, n. retribution

B

b', prep. to b'bree, a little (lit. "to two") b'fahsee, as much as possible (lit. "to twenty-five") b'rigahsehn, highly (lit. "to twenty-three") b'rish, so, very (lit. "to twenty") bah, n. beast bah'ro, n. bahro bahkh (v. bake?) bahntahno, n. island bahr (unknown) bahrehl, v. make bahrehltahn, n. Maker, God bahrehltahv, n. (something) made bahroneht, adj. phosphorescent bahrtah, v. accomplish(?) bahsh, bash, v. sense(?) bahtsahnah, n. map bahtsen, v. map bahtsentahn, n. Cartographer bahvahnin, adj. hidden(?), secure(?), locked(?) bantee, n. series baykh, v. link be, prep. to beerah, v. keep, stay, remain beeree, v. maintain beereetahn, n. Maintainer bekhe, v. compel, force behl, v. claim behlehtsahrah, n. a plant similar to a lechuguilla agave behn, prep. for bigto, n. blessing birahn, n. sea(?) bishtah, n. tunnel biv, determ. all, every bivdil, pron. everything bivrov, pron. everyone -blo, num. 25^5 (=9,765,625), combining form blo, prep. about bo-, pref, simple future tense prefix (will) bodo-, pref, future progressive tense prefix (will be) bodol-, pref, future perfect progressive tense prefix (will have been) boko-, pref, future perfect tense prefix (will have) bol, n. brother bol-, pref, future perfect tense prefix (will have) bonoo, n. acid bonooehts, adj. acidic boogin, n. creature bortah, n. purpose(?) bot (unknown) breh-, prep. to the bree, num. 2, two broon, n. tube buhgsho (unknown)

CH

chahn, v. can(?), be able to(?), may(?) chay, n. fault (geological) chehto, adj. ensuing(?), requisite(?), poor(?) chev, noun, verb, thank chehveht, adj. thankful chehvtahvtee, n. thanks chil, adj. main chilehsh, adv. mainly chir, n. organism chiso, v. archive chisotahn, n. archivist choor, v. learn chor bahkh, n. a type of D'ni food (meat roll?) choylahnay, v. complete

D

d', adv. again, re- D'nee, D'ni, lit. New Start dah'ko, n. marble daba, v. tell daban, n. cannister(?), alembic(?) dahg, v. strike dahgo, n. hammer dahsh, n. dome towers dahtahm, n. firemarble dayjee, n. path dayjee fahlah'ahl, n. labyrinth (unicursal) de-, adv. again, re- dehlin, adj./n. misty, mist deretheni, n. a jet black, light weight, artificial stone deseekay, n. puzzle, enigma devokan, n. hope dil, n. thing do-, present progressive tense prefix (-ing; am/is/are ...ing) dol-, present perfect progressive tense prefix (have been/has been) don, adv. like, as if it were doo, n. food doo'shol, n. cater doo'sholtahn, n. caterer dorehn (unknown) dormahdh, v. defeat dovah, n. world doyhah, n. machine drahtol (unknown) du, n. food

DH

dhaynoy, n. setback dhehlim, n. right(?), wit(?), strength(?), numbers(?) dho, adv. how dhozonehsh, adv. however(?)

EH

eder, n./v. sleep, rest Eder Tomahn, way station, rest house ehg (unknown) ehl, adj. high ehlahth, n. highest ones(?), proud ones(?), elite(?) eleean, n. upper class(?) ehleeahnith, n. upper class member(?), refugee(?), exile(?) elemahr, n. spore elioykh, n. gust elioykhets, adj. gusty ehlon, v. raise(?), uplift(?), elevate(?) ehloneht, adj. uplifting(?), elevated(?) -ehm, 2nd person singular actor suffix (you) ehmee, v. decide(?), win(?) ehmehlahn (unknown) -ehn, 3rd person singular actor suffix (he/she/it) enday, v. build ehndaytahn, n. builder entahn/erthahn/empahn, n. honesty (?), worth (?) enyalo, adj. sick enyaloth, n. sickly one ehrehm, n. skill ehrth, art. a, an -esh, adjective-adverb suffix (-ly) -eht, 1st person plural actor suffix (we) -eht, noun-adjective suffix (-ful) ehtahf (unknown) -eth, adjective-noun suffix (-ty/one) -ehts, noun-adjective suffix (-y; -th)

EE

een, pron. det. any eer, n. bandage (strip of cloth to cover a wound) eest, pron. them; 3rd person plural object pronoun -eet, 3rd person plural actor suffix (they)

F

f', prep. on fah, num. 1, one; single fahdho, n. experience fahehts, adj. first fahlah, v. fold fahm, adj./adv. far fahsee, num. 25, twenty-five fahsh, adj. near feh-, prep. on, upon fehl, v. row feltahn, n. rower, one who rows a boat fenah, n. story fenges, v. act, playing a role fengestahn, n. actor, a person who plays a role fengestoy, n. acting, the art of playing a role fentasenta, n. historian fehrehm, adj. dry filahdh, n. top fitay, v. look(?), marvel(?) flin, n. order, condition folehs, v. watch(?); wait(?) fooruh, adj. sufficient foosah, v. call foosahtahv, n. name forshuh (unknown) freh, prep. at the, on the fuhsh, v. change color(?)

G

g', conj. and g're-, conj. and the gah, conj. and gahlon, n. ground gahlpo, n. cave gahn, n. empire gahrahno, n. ocean(?) Gahreesen, n. garrison, fortress (from gahro ahreeuh senaren "Mighty Protective Structure") gahrkahl, n. storm gahrkahlehts, adj. stormy gahro, adj. great, in might (active strength?) or importance Garohevtee, n. Great Words, Mighty Words, a special set of characters gahrosh, adv. mightily, greatly gahroth, n. greatness, great one gahrtahvo, equal to about 6 hours and 3 minutes of surface time gahth, adv. still, yet gahtsay, n. a kind of animal gatah, adj. due geh'dahn, n. wisdom gehdee, n. surprise(?), setback(?) gehl, v. write (ordinary) gehltahn, n. writer geltav, n. written work, prophetic book or writings geltovokum, n. geltovokum, the Temple to Yahvo gemedet, n. six-in-a-line gehrah, n. center(?), middle(?), sun(?) gehrahn(o), n. foundation(?), strength(?), nourishment(?) gehstoy, n. Art gid, v. excavate gidtahv, n. excavation gilo, n. plant gimit, adj. immediate gipeli, n. a small, colorful creature gira, n. steam(?) gitsah, adj. safe gitsahth, n. safety glahs, v. drink glo, v. begin go (unknown) golah, n. justice(?) golantan, n. judge gonahth, n. poor one(?), servant(?), slave(?), hidden one(?) gopah, conj. because gor, n. time gorahn, equal to about 35 seconds of surface time gorahyan, n. clock gormeht, adv. now (lit. "this time") gormot, adv. then (lit. "that time") gort[e]s, n. group time(?) gorvehn, adv. soon goyray, adv. straight grahnehr, n. circle(?) greh-, conj. and the guhlehm, n. strait(?) channel(?)

H

h'rot (unknown) hahpo, v. combine, mix hahr, n. time, year hahrtehn, v. wait(?), circle(?), approach(?) hahzah, adj. white hee-, 15, fifteen, combining form heebor, 15, fifteen heegahbree, 17, seventeen heegahfah, 16, sixteen heegahsehn, 18, eighteen heegahtor, 19, nineteen heek, n. Gehn's cane hehr, n. number hehrn, n. room hehv, n. word hevkor, n. lexicon, dictionary hehvo, n. swarm hoor, v. find hoosahtay, adj. satisfied(?), satisfactory(?), successful(?) hootsay, adj. holy hootsayth, n. holiness

I

idhsay, n. line iglahrno, adj. temporary -ij, suff. passive voice (to be/is/was/will be/has been/etc.) ikhah, n. meat ila.is, v. power, charge -in, passive participle suffix (-en, -ed, -t) inaltahv, n. opportunity(?), privilege(?) inay, determ. more than irvan, n. mineral istah, v. through(?), operate(?), control(?), use(?) isyeer, v. revere

J

jahgah, v. warrant(?), provide(?) jeroo, adj. possible jerooth, n. possibility jikhah, v. remain(?) jimah, n. prophecy

K

k'tehsh, v. entertain k'tsee, adj. happy kahg, adj. original kahgehsh, adv. originally kahlo, n. wind, breeze kahnhahg (unknown) kahnrad, v. think kahntin, v. oppress(?), enslave(?), imprison(?) kahntinahloth, n. oppressed one(?), slave(?), captive(?), prisoner(?) kahntintahn, n. oppressor(?), slave-owner(?), captor(?) kahzee, v. detour kílo, v. bring kaligo, n. council kam, pron. what kamdol, adv. why kamfah, pron. which (lit. "what one") kamrov, pron. who, whom (lit. "what person") kamto, adv. conj. where (lit. "what place") cannen, n. a device for playing recorded music kat, adv. only, just keebah, v. obey keelah, v. endure(?), spend(?), walk(?) keelehn, n. step kemo, n. a kind of fish native to Eder Kemo kehlahnee, n. antelope kehn, ken, v. be kehrah, kera, adj. brave kerath, n. brave one kehshtahv, n. caution, warning kehso, v. change kehsotahn, n. changer kehsotahv, n. change kehvo, adj. another, in addition to kehvoth, n. another, one who is another kino, v. surrender(?), give up(?), suffer(?), leave (?) kiri, n. krill fly(?) kirin, n. desert sand klay, n. example ko-, simple past tense prefix (did/-ed) kobol-, future in the past tense prefix (would have) kodo-, past progressive (or passive) tense prefix (was/were) kodol-, past perfect progressive tense prefix (had been) kol-, past perfect tense prefix (had) kooahn, n. stream koozah, v. depart(?), leave(?) kor, n. book kor'neeah, n. blank book korbah, n. book-making korfah, n. first book kormahn, n. descriptive book kort[e]s, n. book group(?) korvahkh, kor'vahkh, n. linking book kosuh, adj. many kotah, noun/adj, locked door or having locked door(s) kotsah, n. gate kro, v. move kroges, v. dance krogestahn, n. dancer krogestoy, n. dance, the art of dancing

KH

kh', prep. for khah, adj. few khahg, v. act(?), exist(?) khahntor, v. reflect(?), contemplate(?), concentrate(?) khahpo, adv. perhaps khaht (unknown) kheh-, prep. for khlay, n. example khoy, conj. if(?), because(?), when(?) khoyoo, v. invoke khoytahg, n. result(?), question(?) khreh-, prep. for the

L

l', present perfect tense prefix (has/have), before a vowel l'izchah, v. cry lahn, adj. only -lahn, num. 25^3 (15,625), combining form lahsah, v. seal, close lahth, n. highest ones(?), proud ones(?), elite(?) lan, v. gain(?), wear(?) laysoo, v. carry laysootahn, v. carrier, courier leh-, pref, present perfect tense prefix (has/have) lee-, month, combining form of vílee in the D'ni month names leeahm, n. part(?), component(?), detail(?) leeahnith, n. division(?), partition(?), refugee(?), exile(?) leeshah, adj?, whole leeshahn, n. whole lelam, n. lelam, a plant lehm, lem, n. ink -lehn, num. 25^3 (15,625), combining form, alternate lehnah, n. journey lenitah, n. idiot lesa, adj. sealed lehsh, n. rule, fact lis, v. arrive, get lon, v. discover lonehp, n. discovery(?) look, n. survey loopah, n. precaution(?), risk(?), trip(?) lorahg, n. grace(?), joy(?) loymaht, conj. though

M

m'lah, n. lizard m're-, prep. from the, of the mahdho, v. succeed(?), join(?), participate(?) mahgehn, n. powers(?), wonders(?) mahlah, v. come mahn, n. existence mahnshoo, v. die mahnshootahv, n. death mahnshootahvting, n. mortality(?), fear of death(?), death knell(?) mahnshooth, n. death-bringer, one who brings death maral-obe, n. a woodwind instrument mahrehnt, v. follow mahrg, n. layer mahrn, v. create mahrntahn, n. creator mahrntahv, n. creation mahryayshah, n. fan(?), devotee(?) mahtahn, v. leave(?), put aside(?), dismiss(?) míood, n. means(?), tool(?), ability(?) míruh, v. desire(?), want(?) malo, v. forget meh, prep. from, of, made from mees, v. speak meestahn, n. speaker meestahnyah, n. prophet meestahv, n. speech meet, adv. there mehgoyray, adv. straight out -mel, num. 25^4 (390,625), combining form mehlin, adj. outer mehoor, noun?, pleasure, (idiom) you're welcome mehpord (unknown) mehr, v. watch merk, n. poisoned water mehs, v. require meht, pron. this; these mehtee, determ. these(?) milehsh, v. overwhelm(?), outwit(?) min, n. woman minkata, adj, noun, heavily scarred; Minkata miro, adj. toxic misho, n. universe mishtah, v. construct mishtahtahv, n. construction mo, conj. that(?), the fact that(?) moodehn, n. fortune mooshee, n. invention(?), inspiration(?) mor, n. mother mor'okh'mor, n. grandmother(?) morokhpor, n. paternal grandmother(?) morpah, n. queen mot, pron. which, that motee, determ. those mreh-, prep. from the, of the muhkhon, adj. complex, complicated

N

n', prep. around na'grenis, adj. brittle nahdahn, n. mushroom nahdahnets, adj. mushroomy nahgah/nahgay, v. improve(?) nahkahnehtah/nahtehniltah, interj, (?); Keta says this rapidly after she says "shorah te" "peace be with you"(?) nahn, v. bar(?), obstruct(?), impede(?), command(?), be vigilant(?) nahntahv, n. bar(?), obstruction(?), impediment(?), command(?), vigilance(?) nahr... v. (?) nara, n. the hardest of substances manufactured by the D'ni nahsh, n. part(?) nahvah, n. master naijuh, n. smoke naijuhets, adj. smoked nay, n. root nay-, 10, ten, combining form naygahbree, 12, twelve naygahfah, 11, eleven naygahsehn, 13, thirteen naygahtor, 14, fourteen nayvoo, 10, ten neh, prep. around nee, adj. new, fresh, clean neeah, adj. new, blank neegehsh, adv. merely neetsahvay, v. suffer nehfehkh (unknown) nekis, v. bend, twist, distort(?) nekisahl, adj. bent, twisted, or distorted nekisahloth, n. bent, twisted, or distorted one nehm, v. gather(?) nerim, n. nerim, an animal nehseet (unknown) nehtso, v. produce, make nehzeh, v. read nehzehtahn, n. reader nogin, v. ignore(?), neglect(?), abandon(?) noref, adj. final nuhdahtahv, n. disaster(?) nuhree, n. the primary D'ni monetary unit

O

oehnahzo, v. hope, wish ogel, v. age, get old(?) oglahn, adj. ancient okh, prep. of, belonging to oko, adj. black oleekh (unknown) -om, 2nd singular possessor suff. (your) omd (unknown) -omee, 2nd plural possessor suff. (your) omsheeno (unknown) -on, 3rd singular possessor suff. (his/her/its) oner, adj. just, fair -os, 3rd plural possessor suff. (their) oshahn, v. lose oshahnin, adj. lost -ot, 1st plural possessor suff. (our)

OO

oochah, n. a young tarpin shal oolbah, n. office oolin, v. control(?), govern(?), master(?) oolintahv, n. control(?), mastery(?) oonahn, adj. hostile oonray, n. lord ooroo, n. large gathering, grand community ooshah, n. formula

OY

-oy, 1st singular possessor suff. (my) oyn, prep. myself(?), for my sake(?), moreover(?)

P

pahboy, v. bless pahl, adv?, anyway(?), must(?), please(?) pahm, conj. or pahn, v. trust pahrah, adj. great, in size or (passive?) strength parahno, n. sea(?) pahrahth, n. largeness (in AP "gahroth" would be more correct) pahrkh, v. pray(?) pahrtahvo, equal to about 1 hour 13 mins of surface time, also known as "bell" pahts, n. city palmen, n. magnet palmenets, adj. magnetic panuhdoy, n. an animal paychahvo, n. danger paypeel, v. be upset(?), be distracted(?), anticipate(?) pazgo, v. fund (by a grant) pehkay, adj. equal(?), as much(?) pehlool (unknown) perahth(?) (unknown) pilel, v. receive pirin, adj. rubbed(?) pisho, v. belong po, n. mouth(?) po'aht, n. mouthful(?) po'ahnt, n. saliva pod, determ. each pogeht, v. rule, reign poog, v. prove(?) por, n. father porpah, n. king poruh (unknown) poy, n. bulb prad, n. rock pradets, adj. rocky pradges, v. sculpt pradgestahn, n. sculptor pradgestoy, n. sculpture pradnuretee, n. money stone pradteegahl, adj. rock-working prahchiz, v. amaze(?), astound(?) prehniv, adv. once again prin, adj. small prorahn, equal to about 1.5 seconds of surface time pumi, n. an animal that can jump from tree to tree

R

-rah, num. 25^2 (625), combining form rahm, adj. good rahnahl, adj. various rahshah, adj. dark rahshahth, n. dark, darkness rahsoo, adj. vanquished raiway, n. procedure r(eh)-, art. the/that re'dahntee, n. long tweezers reekoo, n. reekoo, a small creature native to the Age of Ader Jamat reemai, prep. during(?) reepah, n. a timid, gorilla-like animal with a tail resembling a scorpion's rees, v. eat reeslo, v. dissolve reetahn (unknown) rehk, rahk, n. class(?) Relto, lit. "the High Place" relyimah, n. unseen rehm, v. flow rehmah, n. north remehsfeht, adj. diligent remesfeteth, n. diligence ri-, num. 20, twenty, combining form rifeen, v. surpass(?), outnumber(?), incorporate(?) rifoon, v. remember rigahbree, num. 22, twenty-two rigahfah, num. 21, twenty-one rigahsehn, num. 23, twenty-three rigahtor, num. 24, twenty-four ril, determ. no, not rildil, pron. nothing rilnahr, v. not establish(?), not hard(?) rilrov, pron. nobody riltagamin, adj. unknown rilteh, prep. without rilyimah, adj. unseen rinaltahv, n. privilege(?), opportunity(?) rinto, n. coast(?) rish, num. 20, twenty robot, adj. actual rochay, v. meet(?), reach(?), arrive at(?) ron (unknown) Ronay, lit. "People of the Root" roo, conj. that; that rooay, n. route rooayk, v. destroy rooayktahv, n. destruction roob, conj. but roodsh, adj. red roomay, v. ignore(?), circumvent(?), alter(?) roon, num. 0, zero roshee, n. crater rotee (unknown) rov, n. person

S

sahehth, n. own (one), owned thing, property say, n./v. design sayrah, n. west seh, prep. at -see, num. 25, combining form seen, v. get, acquire sehkh, v. have, own sehl, v. Write (Ages) seltahn, n. Writer, one who writes Ages sehn, num. 3, three senahren, n. building, structure seren, n. light seht, set, pron. us sehv, n. age -sh, suff. adjective-adverb suffix (-ly) shahfee, n. span shal, n. tarpin shal, an animal living in high branches shahvehroo, adj. narrow(?), long(?) shaml... , (?) shehbah / shehmah / shinah (unknown) sheegah, n. way(?), path(?), passage(?) sheetem, n. message sheetemsootahn, n. messenger sheeyah, n. angel shehlah (unknown) shehm, pron. you shehnto, v. take shehtehn, v. cherish shin, adj. able sho, n. dirt, soil shokhoo, v. instruct shokrotahn, n. bulldozer shol, v. prepare sholehn, adj. drawn shoogah (unknown) shooth, n. death shorah, n./interj. peace; hello, farewell shoraht, adj. peaceful shufay, v. finish shuhteejoo, n. rocksalt sifay, adj. wired sofehguh, v. fear somah, n. seal, signet sovah (unknown) soygi, adj. stable soygith, n. stability stofah, of one

T

-t, noun-adjective suffix (-ful) t', prep. in, by, with tah, pron. it(?) tahg, v. give tahgahm, v. know tahgayr, v. learn tahleeo, n. surface tahm, n. fire -tahn, verb-noun suffix (-er/-or/-tor) tahroo, v. die (by accident or murder) tarpin shal, n. an animal living in high branches -tahv, verb-noun suffix (-ion, -tion) tahvo, equal to about 14.5 minutes of surface time tanuh, v. be blind(?), be injured(?) tanuhth, n. blindness(?), injury(?) tay, n. aim(?), goal(?) taybuhn (unknown) taygahn, v. love taykheboorkh, v. seek taynee, v. welcome tayr, v. help tayroo, adj. apparent(?), thorough(?) tayroosh, adv. sensibly(?), thoroughly(?) teh, prep. by, with, in; of, among -tee, 2nd person plural actor suffix (you) -tee, plural suffix (-s) tee'ahnah, n. story-teller; Ti'ana (D'ni name of Anna) teeg, v. work teegahl, adj. working teegeht, adj. working teegtahn, n. worker teegtahv, n. work teejuh, n. team(?), crew(?), plan (?) teeko (unknown) teemah, n. south tefoonet, n. memorial tehl, tel, n. guild Telbahtsen, n. guild of Cartographers Telbeeree, n. guild of Maintainers Teldoo'shol, n. guild of Caterers Teledahn, lit. "Place of Mushroomy Spores" Tehlook, n. guild of Surveyors tehlrov, n. guildsman Telshee, n. guild of Messengers tehmah, v. hear(?), heed(?) tehmo, pron. in which(?) tehn, adj. simple tehnehsh, adv. simply tehr, n. tree tehrehlin, n. contact tehrth, prep. in a, of a, as a tehs, n. group tehtehmo, pron. within which(?), during which(?) ti'ana, n. story-teller (D'ni name of Anna) tikolee, n. sorrow tikoleet, adj. sorry timehl, timel, n. gallery tishmah, n. friend tiwah, n. shaft to, n. place togahsh (unknown) togo, n. floor tokituh, v. determine, be determined Tokotah, lit. "place of the locked door" tolesah, n. sealed place, vault tomahn, n. house tomahnah, n. home tomeh, adj. homesick tomeht, adv. here tomot, adv. there tonah, adj. long toogo, n. foot tookhoot (unknown) tool, v. grow toomin, adj. touched (?), handled (?), pressed (?) toonee / toolee / tooree (unknown) tor, num. 4, four toran, unit of angular elevation, equal to 0.00576 degree; a right angle is 15,625 (25^3) torantee torehts, num. fourth torinai, adj. cold torn, v. spit treh-, prep. at the, in the, near the, with the, of the trehl, adj. blue trehn, determ. a few, some trom, n. wing tromehts, adj. winged tuliema, n. a plant in the Serenol Age

TH

-th, adjective-noun suffix (-ty/one) thirk, v. save (keep)

TS

tsahn, adv. always, forever tsahno, adj. everlasting, permanent, eternal (nonliving) tsahnosh, adv. permanently tsahnril, adv. never tsahroo, adj./n. full(?), eye(?) tsahv, v. live tsahvahn, adj. immortal, eternal (living) tsaydor (unknown) tseemah, v. need tseemahahl, adj. needed, necessary tso, prep. of, about tsofah, n. horn (of an animal) tsogahl, adj. sunny, bright tsoid, v. glow tsoidahl, adj. glowing tson, n. foundation(?) tsoonoo, v. greet tsootay, v. dedicate(?), owe(?) tsosahtahv, n. possession(?), treasure(?) tsotoy, n. child

U

uhgraht, n. pillars in the Wahrk Lake uhmt (unknown) urwin, n. a large bird native of Negilahn

V

v'ja, n. celebration vah-, num. 5, five, combining form vahgahbree, num. 7, seven vahgahfah, num. 6, six vahgahsehn, num. 8, eight vahgahtor, num. 9, nine vahkh, adj. linking vahmo, n. east vahmot, adj. eastern vaht, num. 5, five vahtee (unknown) vaiduh, n. tide(?), season(?) vailee, n. month vaiuh, n. event(?), term(?) vaynuh, v. ask(?), explore(?) vaytsoo, vaytsoo, n. presence veechtahv, n. acquisition(?), collection(?) veelay, n. soul veewuh, v. to deserve vehrehn, v. hinder(?), stop(?) viduh, n. atmosphere vog, n. nature vogehts, adj. natural vokan, n. birth volah, interj. yes voohee, v. aux. can, could votahnah, n. truth votahr, v. praise

W

winis, adv. together(?), forward(?) wish, v. lift (raise) wotsah, adj. harsh

Y

yahr, time, day Yahvo, name, Maker, God yeepay, n. eyeglasses yeeshah, n. laughter yehreht, v. aux. may yertis, n. a small plant with yellow berries containing a poison used for hunting food yim, v. see yimah, adj. seen yishah, n. planet(?) yootay, n. guinea pig; v. owe

Z

zahfay, n. fate zeh, pron. her, him(?) zeeglah, adj. mad; insane, twisted, warped zeero, n. center(?), point of origin(?) zeeway, n. mission(?), expedition(?), project(?) zik, n. pod(?) zintsahr, v. guard(?), secure(?), dedicate(?) zith, adj. low zithahth, n. low(est) one, least(?) zithon, v. lower(?) zo'eh, n. loss zoo, pron. me zoodoo, v. regret zuh, n. end zuhnuh, n. ending
